definition: to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

pinyin: Zhong1 yang1 guang3 bo1 dian4 tai2

definition: Australian Broadcasting Corporation (ABC), Australian state-run broadcaster
pinyin: Ao4 zhou1 Guang3 bo1 Dian4 tai2

sentences.english: I got this off of NPR.
sentences.chinese: 我從公共廣播電臺聽到的。

sentences.english: That night I listened to a call-in program on the radio;
sentences.chinese: 那天夜裏我收聽了廣播電臺的採訪節目。

sentences.english: It is a bit like radiowaves coding different radio stations at different frequency bands.
sentences.chinese: 這有點像無線電波在不同的頻段接收不同的廣播電臺。

sentences.english: The radio played dirges all day long.
sentences.chinese: 廣播電臺整天都在播放哀樂。

sentences.english: He played an Irish priest, Father O'Malley. Later, he had his own radio and television shows.
sentences.chinese: 後來，他擁有了自己的廣播電臺，並在電視中演出。

sentences.english: Last night the guangdong People's Broadcasting Station announced that a typhoon was approaching.
sentences.chinese: 昨夜廣東人民廣播電臺預告颱風快要來臨。

sentences.english: The station I listen to most often is on FM .
sentences.chinese: 我最常聽的廣播電臺是在調頻網。

sentences.english: The traffic channel is the regular channel father listens while he is driving every day.
sentences.chinese: 交通臺是爸爸每天開車時必聽的廣播電臺。

sentences.english: She turned the dial and picked up a Japanese radio station.
sentences.chinese: 她轉動收音機調頻，收到了一個日本廣播電臺。

sentences.english: Ha Tae-keung is president of Open Radio for North Korea, which says it relies on sources in the North.
sentences.chinese: 開放北韓廣播電臺據說有來自北韓的消息來源。

sentences.english: The place was 570 on the dial, radio station WMCA.
sentences.chinese: 位置是收音機撥盤上的570，WMCA廣播電臺。

sentences.english: The news was announced by Radio Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 這則消息是由北京廣播電臺發佈的。

sentences.english: Shaanxi People's Broadcasting Station is the earliest one that it set up of China's provincial-level radio station.
sentences.chinese: 陝西人民廣播電臺是中國建臺最早的省級電臺之一。

sentences.english: Excuse me, is this the right way to the radio station?
sentences.chinese: 勞駕，請問到廣播電臺走這條路對嗎？

sentences.english: Radio Beijing radiobroadcasts news at 9 a.m. every day.
sentences.chinese: 北京廣播電臺每天上午九時廣播新聞。

sentences.english: LOCAL】We have a small local broadcasting station in our town.
sentences.chinese: 我們鎮上有個小規模的地方廣播電臺。

definition: Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development of the PRC (MOHURD)/abbr. to 住建部[Zhu4 Jian4 bu4]
pinyin: Zhu4 fang2 he2 Cheng2 xiang1 Jian4 she4 bu4

definition: Rongjiang county in Qiandongnan Miao and Dong autonomous prefecture 黔東南州|黔东南州[Qian2 dong1 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou
the Communist Youth League, abbr. for 共產主義青年團|共产主义青年团[Gong4 chan3 zhu3 yi4 Qing1 nian2 tuan2]
organizing committee/abbr. to 組委|组委
White area (area controlled by the KMT during the Second Revolutionary War 1927-1937)
CCTV New Year's Gala, Chinese New Year special/abbr. to 春晚[Chun1 Wan3]
pinyin: Chun1 jie2 Lian2 huan1 Wan3 hui4

definition: Yunfu prefecture level city in Guangdong province 廣東省|广东省[Guang3 dong1 sheng3] in south China
